sentence.Network_en: This Sumerian learning had a very great vitality.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏美尔人的这种学识是具有强大的生命力的.

sentence.Network_en: The Sumerian, however, had little stone available.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而苏美尔人没有石料可以利用.

sentence.Network_en: So too the stories of Moses and of Samson have Sumerian and Babylonian parallels.
sentence.Network_cn: 同样,关于摩西和参孙的传说在苏美尔和巴比伦也有相似的版本.
